short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Snip simplifies web content for efficient reading, offering concise summaries and text-to-audio, for individuals with dyslexia.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your online reading with Snip, the ultimate companion for smoother comprehension. Snip is a purpose-built Chrome extension designed to cater to dyslexic readers and anyone seeking a more efficient way to digest web content. 

Features:

ğŸ“š Streamlined Summaries: Say goodbye to overwhelming text! Snip intelligently trims down articles, blogs, and web pages, delivering concise summaries that capture the core ideas for people with dyslexia.

ğŸ”Š Text-to-Audio: Prefer listening? Snip's text-to-audio feature transforms summarized content into spoken words, making it effortless to absorb information on the go.

âœ‚ï¸ Simplify Complexity: We understand that less is more. Snip eradicates unnecessary complexity and fluff, ensuring you focus on what truly mattersâ€”critical themes and topics.
